name: Antropoceno
description:
All the game is based on observation and listening

Antropoceno takes you on a journey through the different eras of the universe. From its creation, until our present period, Antropoceno will tell you the impact that man has had on the world and will make you realize that change is still possible, if we are inspired from the forces present in nature.

USE HEADPHONES FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

/************************************************************************************/

CONTROLS :

ZQSD for moving around

E : For interaction

/*Every Input can be change at the launch of the game */
